text: Gumazir taba ti ia mɨgɨa ghaze, Ekiam Izamin Dughiam otogha gɨfa. Gumazir mamɨn nɨghnɨzim ghaze, Godɨn Duam ti uan akar kam a ganɨngizɨ an an gun mɨgei. O gumazir mam Godɨn akam akura akar kam gun mɨgei. O gumazir mam ghaze, e osirizir akɨnafarir mam, akar kam an iti. Ezɨ ia akar kam managh a baraki, ia zuamɨra dɨgavir kuram damighɨva egh okam nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
